question: Which Python library's documentation is recommended as a further reading resource?
response: For further information on the libraries and techniques used in this lesson, you can refer to the Pandas Docs at https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/user_guide/, the Scikit-Learn Docs at https://scikit-learn.org/stable/user_guide.html, and the Seaborn Docs at https://seaborn.pydata.org/api.html. The Gensim documentation is also a helpful resource and can be found at https://radimrehurek.com/gensim/auto_examples/index.html#documentation. For a complete understanding of the topics discussed, referring to "Natural Language Processing in Action: Understanding, analyzing, and generating text with Python," Chapter 6 is recommended.
